duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute fundraising strategies to secure funding for Indigenous community projects and initiatives.
Engage with the Indigenous community and build relationships to inspire support for nonprofit projects.
Write and submit grant proposals to secure funding for specific community work and initiatives.
Plan and organize fundraising events to raise money and awareness for Indigenous community needs.
Communicate with donors and sponsors to maintain relationships and secure ongoing support for nonprofit work.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nonprofit Management, Business, or a related field (relevant certifications preferred)
